#5.4

```{r}
x5 <- c("台北市","新北市","高雄市")
greatTaipei <- c("台北市","新北市")

x5 %in% greatTaipei
```

```{r}
!(x5 %in% greatTaipei)
```

```{r}
y5 <- c("女","男","女")
y5

y5 == "女"
!(y5 == "女")

```

> 圈圏是要圏出"Relational Operation"為真的元素在物件內的「位置」

& : 同時滿足兩個條件
```{r}
x5
y5
x5 %in% greatTaipei
y5 == "女"
(x5 %in% greatTaipei) & (y5=="女")
```

```{r}
y5
y5 == "女"
which(y5=="女")

which((x5 %in% greatTaipei) & (y5 == "女"))
```

 | :滿足其中一個條件
```{r}
x5
y5
x5 %in% greatTaipei
y5 == "女"
(x5 %in% greatTaipei) | (y5=="女")

which((x5 %in% greatTaipei) | (y5=="女"))
```

xor:只滿足其中一個條件(either or)
```{r}
x5 %in% greatTaipei
y5 == "女"
xor(x5 %in% greatTaipei, y5=="女")
```
